Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardListener, MatchListener, PlayerListener, ViewListener, Interviewer, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerTest.Mockview, RMIView, SocketView
    public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interviewer, java.lang.AutoCloseable, MatchListener, PlayerListener, BoardListener, ViewListener
    This class is an abstract server-side View. It contains all the methods needed for the interaction with the controller and implements all the listeners needed to receive information from the model

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int answerTimeout
      Maximum timeout before considering the view disconnected
      protected java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit answerTimeoutUnit
      Measurement unit of the timeout
      private static int CLOSE_CHECK_DELAY
      Timeout used in the waiting loop (when the view is waiting for the queue to get empty)
      private static int CLOSE_TIMEOUT_MILLISECONDS
      The view waits for this amount of milliseconds, with the purpose of emptying the queue, after a shutdown requests
      private boolean connected
      Boolean representing the virtual connection status
      private static int DEQUEUE_TIMEOUT_MILLISECONDS
      Timeout used when dequeueing an event
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService eventThreadPool
      Thread pool used to transmit events
      private static com.google.gson.Gson gson
      JSON conversion utility
      private static int HEARTBEAT_TIMEOUT
      Timeout used to check the heartbeat
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService heartbeatThreadPool
      Thread pool used to check the heartbeat of the client
      protected InputMessageQueue inputMessageQueue
      The message queue which accumulates input messages
      private java.time.Instant lastHeartbeat
      The instant of the last heartbeat that was received
      private java.util.Set<ViewListener> listeners
      Listeners of View events
      protected java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Logging utility
      protected java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<Message> outputMessageQueue
      The message queue which stores output messages ready to be sent
      private Player player
      The player instance associated with this View
      private ClientInitializationInfo setup
      Player initialization information

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Initializes the view. This method should be called after the view construction to collect the user preferences from the client view
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread was forced to stop
        ViewDisconnectedException - if the expected initialization message has not been not received

        This method makes the view start receiving events

      • awaitResponse

        @Nullable
private <T> T awaitResponse​(java.lang.String flowId,
                            java.util.Collection<T> options)
        Called after sending a question, this method waits on the input message queue until a message associated with the question and answer flow is available
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the item in the option collection
        Parameters:
        flowId - the identifier of the question-and-answer flow
        options - the options the client can choose from
        Returns:
        the chosen option or null if no choice was made
        Throws:
        ViewDisconnectedException - if the client didn't give an answer within the available answering timeout

      • disconnect

        private void disconnect()
        Set the connection status to false and notify all the listeners

      • select

        public <T> T select​(java.lang.String questionText,
                    java.util.Collection<T> options,
                    ClientApi messageName)
        Sends a question message to the client view and wait for the response
        Specified by:
        select in interface Interviewer
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the item in the option collection
        Parameters:
        questionText - the question to show to the user
        options - a collection of options to choose from
        messageName - the name which identifies the type of message that is been sent
        Returns:
        the chosen answer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the an empty collection was provided for the "options" parameter

      • selectOptional

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> selectOptional​(java.lang.String questionText,
                                                java.util.Collection<T> options,
                                                ClientApi messageName)
        Sends a question message to the client view and wait for the response that can be empty
        Specified by:
        selectOptional in interface Interviewer
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the item in the option collection
        Parameters:
        questionText - the question to show to the user
        options - a collection of options to choose from
        messageName - the name which identifies the type of message that is been sent
        Returns:
        the chosen answer or an empty optional
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the an empty collection was provided for the "options" parameter
